00068 /*
00069  * Convert the file.
00070  */
00071 bool CELFileConvertToASCII::ConvertXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00072 {
00073         Clear();
00074 
00075         // Read the input file.
00076         CCELFileData inFile;
00077         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00078         if (inFile.Read() == false)
00079         {
00080                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00081                 return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084 
00085         // Copy the input file object to the output file object.
00086         CCELFileWriter outFile;
00087         outFile.SetFileName(newFile);
00088         outFile.SetFileFormat(CCELFileData::TEXT_CEL);
00089         CELConversionUtilities::Copy(inFile, outFile, options);
00090 
00091 
00092         // Write the output file.
00093         if (outFile.WriteTextCel() == false)
00094         {
00095                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00096                 return false;
00097         }
00098 
00099         return true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*
00103  * Convert the file.
00104  */
00105 bool CELFileConvertToASCII::ConvertCalvinFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00106 {
00107         Clear();
00108 
00109         // Read the input file.
00110         CelFileData inFile;
00111         CelFileReader reader;
00112         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00113         try
00114         {
00115                 reader.Read(inFile);
00116         }
00117         catch (...)
00118         {
00119                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00120                 return false;
00121         }
00122 
00123         // Copy the input file object to the output file object.
00124         CCELFileWriter outFile;
00125         outFile.SetFileName(newFile);
00126         outFile.SetFileFormat(CCELFileData::TEXT_CEL);
00127         CELConversionUtilities::Copy(inFile, outFile, options);
00128         inFile.Clear();
00129 
00130         // Write the output file.
00131         if (outFile.WriteTextCel() == false)
00132         {
00133                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00134                 return false;
00135         }
00136 
00137         return true;
00138 }
